LanguageData.SimplyMoreBridges.RestartInfo: Changes require a game restart for effect.
LanguageData.SimplyMoreBridges.AddVisualsTooltip: Also adds bridges with Concrete, Flagstone and Paved Tile-visuals.
LanguageData.SimplyMoreBridges.GenerateFromAllTooltip: Will generate bridges from all loaded Stoney, Woody and Metallic materials.
LanguageData.SimplyMoreBridges.GenerateFloorlikeToolt: Will add sterile bridges made of silver.
LanguageData.SimplyMoreBridges.NoFloorsOnBridges: You can not build a floor without first deconstructing the bridge
